name: The Dark Survivor
description:
Millions of people have been eliminated from the "DARK SURVIVOR CHALLENGE" in searching for the best survivors to save the extinct world. You have been chosen as one of the potential survivors and now it's your turn to save the human extinction by completing challenges with super powers that you have!

✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪

Key Features :

- 3 Unique Super Powers 

- Special Crafted Shoot Trace

- Local Leaderboard System

- Handcrafted Procedurally Generated Map

✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪

This project was created for assignment purpose. The assets in this game are built with zero funding and captured from unity default sprites , self-drawn and royalty free sounds websites .
